SELECT IFNULL(C.SL_CODE,'') AS slCode ,IFNULL(A.PRODUCER_EP_ID,'') AS producerEpId ,IFNULL(A.AUTH_TERM_BEGIN,'') AS authTermBeginString ,IFNULL(C.SL_CODE_MANUFACTURE, '') AS slCodeManufacture ,IFNULL(B.LIC_ADDR,'') AS licAddr ,IFNULL(A.AUTH_TERM_END,'') AS authTermEndString ,IFNULL(B.EP_NAME,'') AS epName, IFNULL( CONCAT( D.PROVINCE_NAME,' ', E.CITY_NAME,' ', F.DISTRICT_NAME ), '' ) AS slAreaCode FROM SL_EP_OEM_AUTH A INNER JOIN SL_ENTERPRISE B ON (A.PRODUCER_EP_ID = B.EP_ID) INNER JOIN SL_SELLER C ON (A.PRODUCER_EP_ID=C.EP_ID) INNER JOIN md_province D on C.PROVINCE_CODE=D.PROVINCE_CODE INNER JOIN md_city E on C.CITY_CODE=E.CITY_CODE AND D.PROVINCE_ID=E.PROVINCE_ID INNER JOIN md_district F on C.DISTRICT_CODE=F.DISTRICT_CODE AND F.CITY_ID=E.CITY_ID WHERE A.SL_CODE = #{filterMap.slCode} AND (A.DEL_FLG=0 or A.DEL_FLG IS NULL) ORDER BY A.PRODUCER_EP_ID
LIMIT #{startPos},#{pageSize};

select COUNT(1) from SL_EP_OEM_AUTH AS A INNER JOIN SL_ENTERPRISE B ON (A.PRODUCER_EP_ID = B.EP_ID) INNER JOIN SL_SELLER C ON (A.PRODUCER_EP_ID=C.EP_ID) INNER JOIN md_province D on C.PROVINCE_CODE=D.PROVINCE_CODE INNER JOIN md_city E on C.CITY_CODE=E.CITY_CODE AND D.PROVINCE_ID=E.PROVINCE_ID INNER JOIN md_district F on C.DISTRICT_CODE=F.DISTRICT_CODE AND F.CITY_ID=E.CITY_ID WHERE A.SL_CODE = #{filterMap.slCode} AND (A.DEL_FLG=0 or A.DEL_FLG IS NULL)
